about.quote: “The best way to predict the future is to create it.“
about.description: A software developer with a passion for technology and innovation. I like creating practical, efficient, and scalable solutions, always thinking about improving the user experience. I'm motivated by facing new challenges, optimizing processes, and continuously learning to grow both technically and creatively.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Technologies, tools, and languages I use in real projects.

otter.title: Otter Task
otter.subtitle: v.1 - MVC Panel
otter.description: Business management system for organizing stock, sales, and purchases. Developed with PHP and MySQL following MVC architecture. Deployed on custom infrastructure with Nginx and Ngrok for collaborative development.

otter-v2.title: Otter Task
otter-v2.subtitle: v.2 - React Migration
otter-v2.description: Migration and modernization of Otter Task to SPA architecture. Frontend completely rewritten in React consuming RESTful API in PHP. Includes new features: ticket generation, QR system, improved sales modal, and more professional workflows. Deployed on custom infrastructure with Nginx and Ngrok.

cpa.title: CPA Refrigeration
cpa.subtitle: Panel + Mobile App
cpa.description: Comprehensive system with mobile app for refrigeration technicians and web admin panel. Allows recording technical visits, equipment status, incidents, and generating reports. Developed as a team, leading the technical implementation of the React frontend integrated with PHP REST API. Deployed on custom infrastructure.

cpa-desinfeccion.title: CPA Disinfection
cpa-desinfeccion.subtitle: Angular Legacy Support
cpa-desinfeccion.description: Maintenance and evolution of legacy system (5 years old) with mobile app and web panel in Angular, and Node.js API. Updated obsolete libraries, fixed critical bugs, implemented new functionalities, and refactored complete modules. Team work acting as tech lead.

mottoso.title: Mottoso Properties
mottoso.subtitle: Full Real Estate Platform
mottoso.description: Complete real estate platform with property catalog for buying and renting, valuation system, interactive map integration, contact forms, and admin panel. Developed as a team with React and PHP. Deployed on custom infrastructure with Nginx.

beretta.title: Beretta Logistics
beretta.subtitle: Transport Control
beretta.description: Logistics control panel for freight transport company. Vehicle fleet management, maintenance history, route planning, fuel control, employee administration, and access role system. Developed as a team with React, PHP, and Tailwind CSS. Led the project's technical architecture.

tateti.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
tateti.subtitle: Classic Game
tateti.description: Implementation of the classic tic-tac-toe game with modern interface and smooth animations. Developed in React to practice state management and game logic.

portfolio-v.1.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio-v.1.subtitle: First Version
portfolio-v.1.description: My first personal portfolio developed in React. Learning project that allowed me to experiment with animations and visual effects, though it had performance issues that motivated this new version you're viewing.

otter-solutions.title: Otter Solutions
otter-solutions.subtitle: Corporate Portfolio
otter-solutions.description: Professional portfolio for Otter Solutions, a software development team where I act as tech lead and developer. Site designed to showcase our services and collaborative projects. Developed in React with modern and responsive design.

sassa.title: Sassa
sassa.subtitle: Financial Landing Page
sassa.description: Promotional landing page for a financial application. Developed with WordPress and Elementor, focused on conversion and attractive visual design.

tattoo.title: Tattoo Sizer
tattoo.subtitle: Tool for Tattoo Artists
tattoo.description: Web application for tattoo artists that facilitates template printing. Allows grouping multiple images in A4 format and adjusting dimensions based on 300 DPI. Developed with vanilla JavaScript and Canvas API. One of my first commercial projects.
